alert.note: Alert for Huron; Sanilac (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Sanilac and Huron Counties through 930 PM EDT... At 759 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Unionville to near Clifford to near Brown City. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Sebewaing and Melvin around 810 PM EDT. Marlette around 815 PM EDT. Owendale around 820 PM EDT. Peck around 825 PM EDT. Pigeon around 830 PM EDT. Elkton around 835 PM EDT. Sandusky, Caseville and Argyle around 840 PM EDT. Carsonville around 845 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Parisville, Huron City, White Rock, Ivanhoe, Rapson, Grindstone City, Amador, Juhl, Elmer and New Greenleaf. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for southeastern Michigan.
